website_summaries.verdict: A sleek and stylish leather look box with stitched detailing. Gives you easy access to your tissues.
pros: Well-made and durable with sturdy wooden construction
The faux leather outer is not only hard-wearing and easy to clean, but looks stylish as well
cons: Users report it doesn't fit many standard size boxes

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and looks great in an office
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and looks great in an office, in the home, wherever. I currently have it in my classroom and definitely adds a little more pizzaz to a regular tissue box.
customer_reviews.author: Holden

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: VERY COOL. This nicely-made tissue box cover adds some sophistication to my bathroom. The lovely black leather matches my decor beautifully!
customer_reviews.author: Flotten

customer_reviews.title: Really nice cover.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice tissue box cover. It is thick with a quilted like texture. The bottom is also covered with a magnetic lid that is very strong and holds well. This is perfect in an office style setting. A great way to cover up an mudane cardboard tissue box.
customer_reviews.author: KRISTY

customer_reviews.title: The tissue box container is really great quality, I love the simple and elegant look
customer_reviews.text: The tissue box container is really great quality, I love the simple and elegant look. I do want to point out that the outside height is 3-3/4”, the inside height is actually 3-1/4". The tissue boxes I have are 3-1/2", just a smidge too high. But taking the tissues out and put them directly into the container works!
customer_reviews.author: Fan Li

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very nice quality and looking, I bought two of them, but different size. I love them
customer_reviews.author: twentyling

customer_reviews.title: It does look exactly like the picture so if this is purely for aesthetics ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife likes it, I think it is OK....pay attention to the rectangular tissue box you buy for it (if you want them to pop up after taking a tissue instead of digging for a new one) because all are not the same. It does look exactly like the picture so if this is purely for aesthetics you will not be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Paradox

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and well made. Wish opening was slightly wider for larger fingers to grab tissues. Other than that, love it.
customer_reviews.author: ASH

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this item.
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this item. We liked it so much, we ordered three of them for our house. You take the dishes out of the box, and put them in here, they feed well, and you can buy big quantities and not have to put the box inside. Looks fabulous. Made well. Great magnetic hold on the bottom closure.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic gift and price!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift and it is exactly how it is pictured. Very nice quality and really nice as a gift. Shipped fast as well, which is awesome! Thanks so much!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and easy to wipe down/clean
customer_reviews.text: High quality for the price! Very sleek looking tissue box holder. Looks great and easy to wipe down/clean.
customer_reviews.author: kim8613

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Doesn't fit all boxes so be sure to buy shorter boxes of tissues.
customer_reviews.author: Moses G.

customer_reviews.title: Love!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This tissue box is absolutely beautiful and the material is really nice and it's really easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Very classy and a great addition to my bathoom
customer_reviews.text: Product is just as pictured. Very classy and a great addition to my bathoom.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Weiler

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking. Doesn't actually hold a tissue box so ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking. Doesn't actually hold a tissue box so you have to manually add the tissues and they always end up getting stuck.
customer_reviews.author: Emily L.

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and tasteful
customer_reviews.text: I really like this tissue container, at first I was a bit surprised to find that a standard tissue box was too tall for this container to have the bottom close. Being the engineer that I am, I came up with a simple solution: Take the tissue out of the original box and place it carefully into the container - worked like a charm. This is so much more elegant in our car with leather seats than a tissue box just thrown in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Hancock

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful tissue box
customer_reviews.text: This is a very aesthetically pleasing tissue box. I wanted something a little more masculine and this fits the bill. My only complaint is that its smaller than a regular tissue box so the tissues don't all fit, the first question you'll be asking yourself is what to do with the small stack of tissues that doesn't fit... The other problem with them not fitting is that the tissues don't come out smoothly, they rip unless you pull them out incredibly slowly and gently. But as the box gets less full it does become easier. Either way if you're looking for a really cool looking tissue box I'd still recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: SL2017

customer_reviews.title: Looks great in my son's room
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in my son's room! I son has a "rock and roll" themed room and his tissue box always stood out. Now this allows for us to cover up the box in a more pleasing way. Fits standard size tissue boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart

customer_reviews.title: perfect way to hide the tissue box
customer_reviews.text: This is such a beautiful design. Perfect for hiding box of tissues in plain sight. It will not work with the 124 count boxes but will work with all that are smaller. A great way to make tissue seem a little more elegant.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi in TX

customer_reviews.title: Purchase only 100 CT boxes of tissue. Smaller size ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchase only 100 CT boxes of tissue. Smaller size is usable, but who wants less tissues in a box which requires more frequent refills.
customer_reviews.author: C. Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: hate this item
customer_reviews.text: you hand buy a box softness take out box and put in this box. a waste money and time.
customer_reviews.author: Robert walker

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. Bought one then I bought two more
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Bought one then I bought two more. Besides the look, now it's easier to pull the tissues without dropping the box.
customer_reviews.author: Viktor

customer_reviews.title: Nice tissue holder; just like the picture!
customer_reviews.text: This holder was even nicer in person! It holds 120 count boxes, the larger ones won't fit, just fyi. I use this in my car & it goes very well with my ebony interior. The material & overall build quality is solid too. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Liked it so much I ordered a second one!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cover. Yes you have to take your tissues out and put them in but it looks so much better than a cardboard box.
customer_reviews.author: juliebug

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but doesn't fit the whole box
customer_reviews.text: This box is really pretty and allows us to keep tissues out in the living room without the unsightly box. Just keep in mind, you'll need to remove the tissues from their cardboard box as the entire box does not fit in the case.
customer_reviews.author: Marci Bunn

customer_reviews.title: Looks great in our bathroom
customer_reviews.text: Clever little thing. Looks great in our bathroom... easy to keep clean.
customer_reviews.author: IreneB

customer_reviews.title: I now cut off the top and a little of the sides and the box fits great.
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive, but a regular box doesn't fit. I now cut off the top and a little of the sides and the box fits great.
customer_reviews.author: Aisling526

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit standard tissue box, but looks great
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit standard tissue boxes so you may have to cut the bottoms off of your tissue box to make it work. The product itself looks great though and worth the extra step (although annoying).
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: More than happy with my stylish box
customer_reviews.text: More than happy with my stylish box. It’s the perfect accent to my bathroom. The magnet is heavy duty and keeps the tissues compact. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: CHELSEA

customer_reviews.title: This is so cool, if you keep tissue around this is the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is so cool , if you keep tissue around this is the way to go
customer_reviews.author: BIG DAVE

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and chic.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my car. It's very well made and looks like a million bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Theophilus

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Okay quality but it doesn't fit a normal size of tissue
customer_reviews.author: S.K.

customer_reviews.title: looking less like a sick bed
customer_reviews.text: So cute. Snazzed up the bedside table. For my winter colds, looking less like a sick bed.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Nadeau

customer_reviews.title: Should have been made larger for the box of Kleenex to fit!
customer_reviews.text: It looks really good, but you have to remove the tissues from the cardboard box before placing in his holder, otherwise it won't fit.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: Classy Touch
customer_reviews.text: Nice tissue box cover. Adds a touch of class to my home office.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa H

customer_reviews.title: Non-standard size
customer_reviews.text: case is slightly smaller than a standard size Kleenex box...we returned it
customer_reviews.author: S. Hooper

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely delighted with this tissue box. It looks really well made and adds a bit of class to the room. I liked it so much I've ordered another in a square size. So much nicer than having a tissue box on show.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Lorenz

customer_reviews.title: Great high quiality tissue box
customer_reviews.text: This looks very expensive when in reality it's a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl Milligan

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Looks expensive, adds a touch of class to my living room. Well made and durable. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Yan

product_meta.title: Love Nest PU Soft Sheep Leather High Class and Fashionable Tissue Box Rectangle/Tissue Box Cover Large Size (1, Sheep Leather Black)
